trans-unit.source: Defines a rectangular brush with a hatch style, a foreground color, and a background color.
trans-unit.target: Define um pincel retangular com um estilo de hachura, uma cor da tela de fundo e uma cor de primeiro plano.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: A hatch pattern is made from two colors: one defined by the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush.BackgroundColor%2A>, which fills the background and one for the lines that form the pattern over the background defined by the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush.ForegroundColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Um padrão de hachura é feito de duas cores: um definido pelo <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush.BackgroundColor%2A>, que preenche a tela de fundo e uma para as linhas que formam o padrão no plano de fundo definido pelo <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush.ForegroundColor%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush.HatchStyle%2A> property defines what type of pattern the brush has and can be any value from the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush.HatchStyle%2A> propriedade define o tipo de padrão de pincel tem e pode ser qualquer valor entre o <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle> enumeração.

trans-unit.source: There are more than fifty elements in the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Há mais de 50 elementos no <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle> enumeração.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows an ellipse filled with a horizontal hatch pattern.
trans-unit.target: A ilustração a seguir mostra uma elipse preenchida com um padrão de hachura horizontal.

trans-unit.source: ![Hatch Pattern](~/add/media/hatch1.png "Hatch Pattern")
trans-unit.target: ![Padrão de hachura](~/add/media/hatch1.png "padrão de hachura")

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush> shown in the previous illustration.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como criar o <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush> mostrado na ilustração anterior.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle" /> enumeration and foreground color.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" /> com a cor de primeiro plano e a enumeração <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle" /> especificados.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle" /> values that represents the pattern drawn by this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" />.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle" /> que representa o padrão desenhado por este <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure that represents the color of lines drawn by this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" />.
trans-unit.target: A estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> que representa a cor das linhas desenhadas por este <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle" /> enumeration and foreground color.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" /> com a cor de primeiro plano e a enumeração <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle" /> especificados.

trans-unit.source: The background color is initialized to black.
trans-unit.target: A cor de plano de fundo é inicializada para preto.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle" /> values that represents the pattern drawn by this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" />.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle" /> que representa o padrão desenhado por este <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure that represents the color of lines drawn by this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" />.
trans-unit.target: A estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> que representa a cor das linhas desenhadas por este <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure that represents the color of spaces between the lines drawn by this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" />.
trans-unit.target: A estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> que representa a cor dos espaços entre as linhas desenhadas por este <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle" /> enumeration, foreground color, and background color.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" /> com a cor de primeiro plano, cor da tela de fundo e a enumeração <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle" /> especificados.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows an ellipse filled with a horizontal hatch pattern.
trans-unit.target: A ilustração a seguir mostra uma elipse preenchida com um padrão de hachura horizontal.

trans-unit.source: ![Hatch Pattern](~/add/media/hatch1.png "Hatch Pattern")
trans-unit.target: ![Padrão de hachura](~/add/media/hatch1.png "padrão de hachura")

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush.%23ctor%2A> to create the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush> shown in the previous illustration.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar o <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush.%23ctor%2A> para criar o <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush> mostrado na ilustração anterior.

trans-unit.source: Gets the color of spaces between the hatch lines drawn by this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a cor dos espaços entre as linhas de hachura desenhadas por este objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure that represents the background color for this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> estrutura que representa a cor de plano de fundo para este <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia exata desse objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" /> this method creates, cast as an object.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" /> que esse método cria, convertido como um objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the color of hatch lines drawn by this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a cor das linhas de hachura desenhadas por este objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure that represents the foreground color for this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> estrutura que representa a cor de primeiro plano para este <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the hatch style of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estilo de hachura deste objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" />.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle" /> values that represents the pattern of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" />.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle" /> que representa o padrão deste <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" />.
